monster.name: Rubelonth - Abyssal Fire Drake

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rubelonth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Beguiling Scales
entries: Rubelonth has advantage on the first saving throw against the spell or other magical effects of a creature. After the creature forces him to make a save against their magical effect, this trait does not apply to that creature until 24 hours have passed since they last forced Rubelonth to make a save against their magical effect.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of Rubelonth's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches Rubelonth or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rubelonth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rubelonth can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Rubelonth's choice that is within 120 ft. of him and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Rubelonth exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Avalanche of Greed {@recharge 5}
entries: Rubelonth spills a wave of red-hot coins from his trove in a 30-foot cone. All creatures caught in the area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, suffering 30 (10d6) bludgeoning damage and 12 (3d6) fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.

legendaryHeader: Rubelonth can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Dragon Madness (3 actions)
entries: Rubelonth can instill his own wretched greed upon others by tossing a handful of his hellish coins into the midst of his enemies. Anyone within a 30-foot cube centered on Mammon must make a successful {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or be overwhelmed with desire to possess his hellish coins, using their action on their turn to collect as many as possible. At the end of their turn, a creature affected by the madness can save against this effect again, ending it on a success and becoming immune to it for 24 hours.

legendaryGroup.name: Rubelonth
lairActions: When fighting inside its lair, Rubelonth can invoke the ambient magic to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Rubelonth can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Magma erupts from a point on the ground the dragon can see within 120 feet of it, creating a 20-foot-high, 5-foot-radius geyser. Each creature in the geyserâ€™s area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A tremor shakes the lair in a 60-foot radius around the dragon. Each creature other than the dragon on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

Volcanic gases form a cloud in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round. Each creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its turn. While poisoned in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated}.
